name: Tiny Animal War
description:
Look! A cute dog there~



There are variety of cute animals residing in this peaceful magical forest.
Collect and organize your own animal troops to defend incoming intruders!



●Planning for various strategies
－Thousands of carefully crafted levels. Enjoy variety of battle challenges.
　－Enormous 7x7 battlefield. Enjoy battles of epic scale.
　－More than 30+ unique skills. Play with your own style.



●Recruit to level up heroes、Merge troops to grow your army
－Level up powerful heroes to lead your troops
　－Recruit animal troops with in-game coin and merge them to increase your power in battle
　－More than 45+ unique animals to collect.



●Get Resources While Being Away、Competitive Arena battle
－Animals will collect resources for you while your are being away
　－Lead your troops to compete against other players



＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
Please feel free to contact us if you have encountered any technical difficulties or bugs. We will process any issues you have as soon as possible

Follow us on our official Facebook Page for more updates!
